title: Classic Italian lasagne
ingredients: ['For the meat sauce', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, diced', '2 small celery sticks, diced', '2 carrots, diced', '2 large cloves of garlic, minced', '1kg lean beef mince', '2 tablespoon tomato pur√©e', '500g passata', '250ml red wine', '4 to 6 fresh basil leaves, chopped', 'Salt and pepper, to taste', 'For the bechamel sauce', '60g butter', '60g plain flour', '600ml milk', '1 bay leaf', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '375g fresh or pre-cooked lasagne sheets', '450g mozarella, thinly sliced', '75g grated Parmesan']
